name: Shrimp Jambalaya
author: ANGIEQ
summary: Something for that day you just don't really want to cook but want to use a slow cooker.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 medium green bell pepper, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, with liquid
1 pound cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a slow cooker, mix chicken, celery, green bell pepper, onion, garlic, tomatoes with liquid, sugar, salt, Italian seasoning, cayenne pepper, and bay leaf
Cover, and cook on Low 7 to 9 hours
Remove bay leaf from the chicken mixture, and stir in orzo
Cook 15 minutes, until orzo is tender
Stir in shrimp, and cook 2 minutes, until shrimp are heated through
